text: Lev Nikolayevich Korolyov (also Korolev, ; September 6, 1926 - January 5, 2016) was a Soviet-born Russian computer scientist. He was a corresponding member of the USSR Academy of Sciences. He was involved in the development of the first Soviet computers. Korolyov was born in Podolsk, Russia. He studied at Moscow State University. Korolyov died at his home in Moscow, Russia at the age of 89. ==References== ==Other websites== *Biography of L. N. Korolev at Virtual Museum Computer. title: Lev Nikolayevich Korolyov
